articles.description: Eyebrows were raised when Real Madrid paid Liverpool £8.4m to sign Trent Alexander-Arnold early, but his first month with the Spanish club has repaid their calculated gamble.
articles.title: Alexander-Arnold pays back Real Madrid signing fee - and the new 'Raul'

articles.description: Novak Djokovic overcomes physical issues to join Jannik Sinner in the Wimbledon second round, but third seed Alexander Zverev is out.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025 results: Novak Djokovic overcomes physical issues to reach second round

articles.description: England are 2-0 down in the five-match T20 series against India and face a tough challenge to turn things around.
articles.title: England vs India: Questions for Charlotte Edwards and Nat Sciver-Brunt after bump back to earth

articles.description: Manchester City are heading home from the Club World Cup after a shock defeat by Saudi side Al-Hilal, so what now for Pep Guardiola's side?
articles.title: Man City: What now after Club World Cup exit?

articles.description: Switzerland may be known for its snow-covered mountains, cosy chalets and world-class skiing, but the sun-scorched country is looking very different for Euro 2025.
articles.title: Euro 2025: How will teams and fans cope with sweltering heatwave in Switzerland?

articles.description: French Open champion Coco Gauff is knocked out in the first round of Wimbledon on a day of shocks at the All England Club.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025 results: French Open champion Coco Gauff out in first round on day of shocks

articles.description: England's first-Test victory over India was another reason to defend the longest format of the game, writes Stephan Shemilt.
articles.title: England vs India: 'Test cricket defended like a subculture, with good reason'

articles.description: Finn Russell and Jamison Gibson-Park could be a devastating Lions partnership against the Queensland Reds and beyond, writes Tom English.
articles.title: British and Irish Lions 2025: Finn Russell and Jamison Gibson-Park seek to thrill against Queensland Reds

articles.description: The 38-year-old superstar is expected to stay at the United States club beyond his current deal as talks continue.
articles.title: Lionel Messi: Inter Miami confident Argentina foward's contract will be renewed

articles.description: Formula 1 president Stefano Domenicali will tell Prime Minister Sir Keir Starmer how important F1 is to the UK economy before the British Grand Prix.
articles.title: Formula 1 president Stefano Domenicali and PM Sir Keir Starmer to meet before British GP
